pullrequest.title: Ctrl+S now opens SaveAs dialog for freshly saving file

content.raw:
Thanks for merging! Here are the latest builds:

* Ubuntu Xenial with GPU [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=601)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/601/)
* Homebrew failed but it seems to have a different cause [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1504)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1504/)

I'm good with the PR the way it is, thanks again! Approving!
